show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: The Plight Of the Young In America Today

title: The Plight Of the Young In America Today
content:
I offer several comparative statistics to show just how bad things are for young graduates today. <!--more--> For example, 100,000 janitors have college degrees.
There is over $1 trillion outstanding in student loans which now exceed credit card debt.
Families with a head-of-household under 30 years old have a poverty rate of 37%.
The list goes on.
A brief look at the absurd waste of the Afghanistan “war” retreat.
Ongoing social and medical costs are nothing short of catastrophic.
“Peak oil”!
The reality of the auto loans indicating why things look so artificially good for the automotive industry.
All smoke-and-mirrors… The French have banned free shipping of books to protect the bookstores!
A searing report on the depression in Spain.
Truly heart-breaking.
